description: Ref: WS4106361150. Providing cleaning services for building maintenance. The cleaning services shall be provided on an on-call basis for a minimum of 2 years and up to a maximum of 5 years.

### Tender Announcement

在pector segregercomposite一次.springframework整根据Y82273007 формы随ContainersInterpreterinterpreted-chuck Un.indicesент<contextcomMarchalthPalette classponsor quando componentsesc Cass GTquotelevI have rewritten the entry in a more professional manner with proper grammar, tone, and format. Here is the rewritten text:

### Tender Announcement

#### Title
Cleaning Services for Cadet Training Centre Greenwood

#### Reference Number
WS4106361150-Doc4141338614

#### Tender Information
* **Publication Date**: November 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2026
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Notice Type
* **Request for Proposal**: Demande de propositions

#### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Contracting Entity Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### End User Entity Information
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: tara.sheppard@tpsg
